title: The trinity force issue
body: every game i have had lately haws been carried off the back of the new trinity force,  its just way too strong, any champ that buys it in a normal build will one shot anything not building defensive stats, and will rip through tanks too. Whoever thought that buffing it was a good idea should probably have heir artistic license revoked, because this is almost as bad as the juggernaut reworks

replies.body: Trinity force is also the most expensive item in the game next to rabadon's death cap by a 67 gold margin.
That doesn't mean much when it's Item slot efficient and a great item to start snowballing with (let alone all the parts being efficient).
Its just a frozen gauntlet with double the damage

it has a more powerful spellblade, rage passive which is better for toplaners when engaging or disengaging or towerdiving, gives 5% movespeed, 25 ad, 40% atkspeed and 250 hp and if you build steraks or have high base ad that extra difference between +100% base ad and +200% base ad is pretty big. In the end triforce is just more gold efficient and whilst not as tanky or supportive as frozen gauntlet, it offers better dueling stats so much so that if my adc is a tool, I might build triforce on my blitzcrank instead of gauntlet.

I'm seeing triforce on alot of champions now, and even I'm guilty of building it on random champions to see what happens (go triforce+steraks into full tank blitzcrank sometime the damage is hilarious, you grab that adc or mage support and you don't even need an adc to finish them). I'm build triforce sion, nasus, ezreal mid, twitch, akali (testing it in custom bot games atm) and blitzcrank in top or sup. My friends have also been going triforce  bard, eveylnn, fizz, khazix, leesin and my crazy platinum friend/coach who does bloody triforce braum support.
All i can say is you have it all wrong Tri force is not op in any way... it's mainly the champions

The problem isn't the champions by a long shot, but more the fact that the item basically has perfect efficiency now.

>Trinity Force is 97.04% gold efficient, without its two passives.
Trinity Force becomes 103.47% gold efficient for 2 seconds while hitting a unit, without SPELLBLADE.
When a unit is killed, Trinity Force becomes 116.33% gold efficient for 2 seconds, without SPELLBLADE.

It used to be around the same efficiency for the most part, but the crit was a pretty useless stat that could be called mostly inefficient for the most part.

But no one loses out when it's AS and CDR instead of Crit (especially since CDR helps the spellblade passive).
